DOCKING_CLEARANCE_EXPIRED.message: A autorização para docagem expirou. Se deseja docar tem de repetir o pedido.

CARBON_ORE_DESCRIPTION.message: Carbon ores (coal and oil) are required for the synthesis of many useful chemicals, including plastics, synthetic foodstuffs, medicines and textiles

WHEELS_ARE_DOWN.message: O trem de aterragem está em baixo

HULL_AUTOREPAIR.message: Sistema de reparação automática do casco

GAME_LOAD_WRONG_VERSION.message: This saved game cannot be loaded because it was created by a different version of Pioneer.

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: An electronic countermeasure missile defence system, capable of destroying more advanced types of homing missiles.

LIQUID_OXYGEN_DESCRIPTION.message: Oxygen is required for life support systems and some industrial processes

CARGO_BAY_LIFE_SUPPORT_LOST.message: Sensors report critical cargo bay life-support conditions.

SET_HYPERSPACE_TARGET_TO_FOLLOW_THIS_DEP.message: Hyperspace cloud analyzer: Set hyperspace target to follow this departure

DISTANCE_FROM_SHIP_TO_NAV_TARGET.message: Distance from ship to navigation target

UNEXPLORED_SYSTEM_STAR_INFO_ONLY.message: Unexplored System. Star information has been gathered by remote telescope, but no planetary information is available.

REMOVE_FROM_WHICH_MOUNT.message: Remove laser from which gun mount?

LANG_NAME.description: The name that native speakers use for this language. This will be used in the language selection screen. For obscure reasons this currently must only use Latin-1 characters.

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permits scooping cargo pods from space.

SIMULATING_UNIVERSE_EVOLUTION_N_BYEARS.message: A simular a evolução do universo: %age{f.1} mil milhões de anos ;-)

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to blast-mine mineral rich asteroids.

LAUNCH_PERMISSION_DENIED_BUSY.message: Autorização para descolar negada: baía de docagem ocupada.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Automatically repairs the ship's hull in the event of damage.

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Increases the rate at which shields recharge.

HARD_CAPITALIST.message: Entirely Capitalist - no government welfare provision

THANKS_AND_REMEMBER_TO_BUY_FUEL.message: Thank you for your purchase. Remember to fit equipment and buy fuel before you depart.

SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Provides a 3D map of nearby ships.

VIOLENT_ANARCHY.message: Disorder - Overall governance contested by armed factions

SPACESTATION_LONG_WELCOME_MESSAGE.message: Hello, traveller.  Welcome to our little blue play-pen.  If it's your first time here, feel free to get acquainted with the residents.  We hope you enjoy your stay.\nPlease remember that renovations are under way, and that scenery may change between visits.

HYDROGEN_DESCRIPTION.message: Hydrogen is primarily used as a fusion fuel

UNOCCUPIED_CABIN_DESCRIPTION.message: Required for transport of a single passenger

FINE_PAID_N_BUT_N_REMAINING.message: You have paid %paid but still have an outstanding fine of %fine.

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Provides additional hull defences with each unit fitted.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Analyze hyperspace clouds to determine destination and time of arrival or departure.

GAME_LOAD_CANNOT_OPEN.message: This saved game file could not be opened due to permissions or something...

AUTOPILOT_ENTER_LOW_ORBIT_AROUND.message: Piloto automático: Entrar em órbita baixa à volta de %target

WE_HAVE_NO_BUSINESS_WITH_YOU.message: We have no business with you at the moment.

ITEM_IS_OUT_OF_STOCK.message: This item is out of stock.

SHIP_IS_ALREADY_FULLY_REPAIRED.message: A sua nave está em perfeitas condições.

AUTOPILOT_DOCK_WITH_STATION.message: Piloto automático: Docar com a estação espacial

GAME_SAVE_CANNOT_WRITE.message: This saved game file could not be written because of a system error.

AUTOPILOT_FLY_TO_VICINITY_OF.message: Piloto automático: Voar até à proximidade de %target

CLEARANCE_ALREADY_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Clearance already granted. Proceed to docking bay %bay.

TRADER_NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY.message: Trader does not have enough money

FIT_TO_WHICH_MOUNT.message: Fit laser to which gun mount?

NO_FREE_SPACE_FOR_ITEM.message: Não tem espaço disponível para este item.

CANT_SAVE_IN_HYPERSPACE.message: Can't save game while in hyperspace

GAME_LOAD_CORRUPT.message: This saved game cannot be loaded because it contains errors.

RADAR_MAPPER_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to remotely inspect the equipment, cargo and state of other ships.

SHIP_ALTITUDE_ABOVE_TERRAIN.message: Altitude do navio acima do terreno

YOU_MUST_PAY_FINE_OF_N_CREDITS.message: We do not tolerate crime. You must pay a fine of %fine.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: An improved cooling system for your weapons.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permits scooping hydrogen fuel from gas giant planets.

FUEL_SCOOP_ACTIVE_N_TONNES_H_COLLECTED.message: Fuel scoop active. You now have %quantity tonnes of hydrogen.

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION.message: Permite o transporte de mercadoria viva.

SET_LOW_THRUST_POWER_LEVEL_TO_X_PERCENT.message: Set low thrust power level to %power%%

CARGO_SCOOP_ACTIVE_1_TONNE_X_COLLECTED.message: Cargo scoop active. Collected 1 tonne of %item.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_NO_BAYS.message: Clearance denied. There are no free docking bays.

NO_SPACE_ON_SHIP.message: Não há espaço na sua nave

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: An electronic countermeasure missile defence system, capable of destroying some homing missiles.

FINE_PAID_N.message: You have paid the fine of %fine.

UNEXPLORED_SYSTEM_NO_SYSTEM_VIEW.message: Sistema inexplorado. Vista de sistema indisponível.

DOWNGRADING_ALERT_STATUS.message: No fire detected for 60 seconds, downgrading alert status.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Shields your spaceship from the heat of atmospheric re-entry.

CLEARANCE_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Clearance granted. Proceed to docking bay %bay.
